author: jalkanen
msg: Uses now TextUtil.getStringProperty() in most places.
Fixed problem with certain elements being generated as empty, even though that was not recommended by XHTML 1.0

author: jalkanen
msg: Uses now TextUtil.getStringProperty() in most places.

author: jalkanen
msg: Now ignore spaces in front and behind the param values.

author: arj
msg: Turned on JDBC autocommit for the db-setup/teardown operations. This allows certain SQL blocks to gracefully succeed even when there are stupid errors. So if we drop a table or user that doesn't exist, it won't b0rk our test scripts. Also tweaked the McKoi targets so they don't fire when other JDBC databases are used. Rookie mistake, really.

author: arj
msg: Fixed SQL calls that should have used 'executeUpdate' instead of 'executeQuery' for test harness INSERT statements.
